tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE art_dealers ( 
    art_piece_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    art_piece_name VARCHAR(255), 
    artist_name VARCHAR(255), 
    price DECIMAL(10,2), 
    sale_date DATE 
);

CREATE TABLE sales_history (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    art_piece_id INT,
    sale_date DATE,
    sale_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    buyer_name VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE ArtPieces (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    artist VARCHAR(255),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE SalesHistory (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    art_piece_id INT,
    sale_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    sale_date DATE,
    buyer VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE art_dealers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    dealer_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE art_pieces (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    piece_name VARCHAR(255),
    artist_name VARCHAR(255),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE sales (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sale_date DATE,
    piece_id INT,
    dealer_id INT,
    sale_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE sales_history (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sale_date DATE,
    piece_id INT,
    dealer_id INT,
    sale_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE art_piece (
    art_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    piece_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    artist_id INT,
    price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    sale_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE contact (
    contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contact_name VARCHAR(255),
    contact_email VARCHAR(255),
    gallery_id INT,
    artist_id INT
);
